p: The incorporation of these two outlined antimicrobial compounds into formulations can be an effective method to reduce microorganisms, rather than the direct addition of the component to food, because it can gradually migrate from the film or coating onto the food surface ( Elsabee and Abdou, 2013). Furthermore, the study of food conservation and control of microorganisms that cause decay and disease, through the design of new materials (nanostructured formulations) has been noteworthy ( Sotelo et al., 2015; Sotelo-Boyás et al., 2016).
